message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within a certain budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
